akn:section.akn:heading: Retention of existing rights of members

akn:content.akn:p: § 413. Retention of existing rights of members Nothing contained in this subchapter shall limit the rights and remedies of any member of a labor organization under any State or Federal law or before any court or other tribunal, or under the constitution and bylaws of any labor organization. (Pub. L. 86–257, title I, § 103, Sept. 14, 1959, 73 Stat. 523.)
